bear-pit-001.jpg: Overhanging rock formation known as the Bear Pit on Howker Ridge Trail.
bear-pit-002.jpg: Sign nailed to a tree marking the Bear Pit along the trail.
bear-pit-003.jpg: View inside the Bear Pit, showing layered granite ledges and surrounding forest.
blueberry-ledge-001.jpg: Sunlit forest floor with moss and lichens near Blueberry Ledge on Howker Ridge Trail.
blueberry-ledge-002.jpg: Mossy boulders and granite slabs at the Blueberry Ledge section of Howker Ridge.
blueberry-ledge-003.jpg: Forest path through conifers and boulders near Blueberry Ledge.
devils-kitchen-001.jpg: Wooden "Devil’s Kitchen" trail sign attached to a tree with a blurred forest background.
devils-kitchen-002.jpg: Cold stream cascading over mossy rocks in the Devil’s Kitchen ravine.
devils-kitchen-003.jpg: Snow‑covered rocky gorge with scattered logs in the Devil’s Kitchen area.
first-howk-001.jpg: Moss‑covered rocks and ledges on the First Howk ridge.
flora-wildlife-001.jpg: Close‑up of a vibrant green mossy plant along the trail.
flora-wildlife-002.jpg: Macro view of alpine foliage and berries growing on Howker Ridge.
flora-wildlife-003.jpg: Carpet of low‑growing alpine plants and mosses on the forest floor.
flora-wildlife-004.jpg: Mountain shrub with red berries and dark green leaves along the trail.
fourth-howk-001.jpg: Snowy summit ridge and distant peaks viewed from the Fourth Howk.
hitchcock-falls-001.jpg: Water cascading over rocks at Hitchcock Falls in autumn.
hitchcock-falls-002.jpg: Sunlit waterfall tumbling down a boulder‑strewn ravine at Hitchcock Falls.
howker-osgood-junction-001.jpg: Trail signpost at the Howker–Osgood Junction overlooking a sweeping mountain valley.
kelton-crag-001.jpg: Dramatic vista from Kelton Crag with colorful autumn foliage in the valley below.
kelton-crag-002.jpg: Rocky ledge at Kelton Crag with evergreens and distant hills.
kelton-trail-junction-001.jpg: Wooden junction sign marking the Kelton Trail amid dense spruce forest.
kelton-trail-junction-002.jpg: Kelton Trail junction sign standing among snow‑covered trees.
mount-madison-summit-001.jpg: Rime‑encrusted signpost emerging from deep snow at Mount Madison’s summit.
mount-madison-summit-002.jpg: Snowy ridge with a high summit and deep‑blue sky at Mount Madison.
mount-madison-summit-003.jpg: Expansive view from Mount Madison showing icy ridgelines and the valley below.
pine-link-junction-001.jpg: Weathered wooden sign nailed to a tree at the Pine Link trail junction.
trailhead-001.jpg: Trailhead sign for Howker Ridge surrounded by golden wildflowers.
trailhead-002.jpg: Hiking trailhead sign amid colorful autumn brush near the road.
third-howk-001.jpg: US Forest Service sign warning of trail maintenance work near the Third Howk.
third-howk-002.jpg: Frosted ridgeline at dawn with pastel skies seen from the Third Howk.
third-howk-003.jpg: Sunset view over rolling ridges from the Third Howk.
coosauk-falls-001.jpg: Small waterfall cascading through boulders at Coosauk Falls on the Howker Ridge Trail.
coosauk-falls-002.jpg: Close‑up of a mossy cascade at Coosauk Falls with sunlight filtering through trees.
